partners.title: Our
partners.subtitle: Hundreds of entrepreneurs have achieved 3–4x growth through our websites and landing pages — you can be the next success story.

founder.title: A few words about the Founder
founder.p1: I am a software developer coming from a general background. Since childhood, I had a strong passion for computers and programming. That curiosity led me to start my journey. In 2025, I founded a digital agency named Bikroyon. Since then, I have been helping brands increase their sales through websites and social media. I have worked on more than 350 projects including e-commerce websites, landing pages, and custom web applications. My goal is to build websites that are effective and result-driven for every client.
founder.p2: My core work philosophy is to understand the client's needs and provide the best solution. I believe a great website is not just a combination of design and features—it is a powerful tool for business growth and success. That's why I work with full dedication in every project to deliver the highest quality service.
founder.name: Abdul Baset Bappy

team.title: Our

landing_section.title_first: Make your Brand's first Impression with a
landing_section.title_last: — start with a perfect Single Page Website.
landing_section.description: With 300+ landing page design experience, I know how to make a business credible and converting. If you haven’t created your landing page yet, you’re one step behind your competitors. We create pages that really work, tailored to your brand, goals, and audience.

landing_defination.what_is_description: A landing page is a special web page focused on a product, service, or offer. Its purpose is to encourage the visitor to take a specific action, such as filling out a form, signing up, or making a purchase.
landing_defination.why_needed_description: Understanding how Facebook's algorithm works will help you realize why a landing page is essential. Some users prefer to send messages directly via Facebook inbox, so Facebook separates them. Additionally, users who order directly from landing pages or websites create a separate audience. Using a landing page allows you to target your audience more effectively and increase conversions.
landing_defination.benefits_heading: Benefits of having a landing page:
benefits_list: Run ads with server-side tracking and pixel setup to make more sales
Retarget visitors who left footprints on your website to increase conversions
One-click automatic order entry for Studfast, Pathao courier
landing_defination.cpa_heading_first: See in the image — Product worth
landing_defination.cpa_subheading: Smart Landing + Strategy = Sell with less effort

landing_faq.subtext: We have listed the most common questions customers ask. Please read this FAQ before messaging us—this will save you time and give you instant answers.
landing_faq.q1: What benefits do I get after purchasing a package?
landing_faq.a1: Depending on your selected plan, you will get a complete ready-to-launch sales funnel, premium plugins, automation system, and full support.
landing_faq.q2: How long does it take to deliver after payment?
landing_faq.a2: Normally, your project will be delivered within 5–7 business days after confirming the payment.
landing_faq.q3: Do I need my own domain and hosting?
landing_faq.a3: No. You can either use your own domain & hosting or choose our hosting-included package.
landing_faq.q4: Can I edit the content myself?
landing_faq.a4: Yes. We design your funnel so you can easily edit any content, and we also provide tutorials.
landing_faq.q5: Will live chat or invoice system be included?
landing_faq.a5: These features are available in selected packages. You can also add them separately.
landing_faq.q6: Will the website be mobile friendly?
landing_faq.a6: Absolutely. All our funnels and websites are fully responsive and mobile-friendly.
landing_faq.q7: Will I get support after delivery?
landing_faq.a7: Yes. Every package includes a certain period of free support. You can also purchase extended support.
landing_faq.a8: Yes. You can customize the features according to your needs and our team will guide you.

heroSection.title: We are
heroSection.paragraphs1: Bikroyon is a professional web development, digital marketing, and AI automation agency in Bangladesh. Since 2020, we have been designing and developing custom websites, landing pages, and complete digital solutions for our clients. Our main goal is to help every client's business grow quickly and efficiently online.
heroSection.paragraphs2: Our team consists of skilled WordPress and Laravel developers, UI/UX designers, and digital marketing experts. We don't just create websites; we create effective, SEO-friendly, and conversion-focused digital products for businesses.
heroSection.paragraphs3: We believe that every client is unique. Hence, each of our projects is fully customized. Our work enhances your brand visibility, builds customer trust, and boosts online sales. Our design and development process always ensures responsive, secure, and fast-loading websites.
heroSection.missionParagraph: Our mission is to ensure the digital success of every client. We don’t just build websites; we create a strong online presence for your brand. Working with Bikroyon means you get custom solutions, fast support, and professional design that keeps your business ahead in a competitive market.

skills.subtitle: Bikroyon provides industry-leading web development, design, and marketing services. We build modern, effective solutions to strengthen your online presence.

tools.title: The
tools.subtitle: We carefully choose the best and most professional tools for every project. These technologies make our work faster, more efficient, and high-quality.

why_choose.subtitle: Why Our Clients Love Working With Us
why_choose.description: We don’t just build websites — we create high-performing digital products for your business. Every project is customized, fast, secure, and ROI-focused. Our goal is not just a website, but making your business successful online.

benefits.text: Every project is tailored to match your brand. Features and functionalities are built based on your business goals.
Our designs load fast, are SEO-friendly, and optimized to increase conversions.
Even after launch, we ensure your website remains secure, updated, and fully functional.
We run SEO, ads, and social media campaigns to help your business grow faster.
With 5+ years of experience, hundreds of successful projects, and many satisfied clients, we deliver trust and reliability.
Whether you’re a small business or a large enterprise, we offer packages that fit your budget.

hero.heading_first: Elevate Your Brand with a Complete Online Presence Through a Website That’s Not Just
hero.description: With 30+ successful website projects under my belt, I know exactly how to build a credible, high-converting website that drives real business growth. If you don’t have a professional website yet, you’re already falling behind in the digital race. I create custom websites that perfectly reflect your brand, goals, and audience — websites that increase sales and build unbreakable customer trust.

hero.heading_first: A Custom Web App for Your Business
hero.description: We build custom web applications tailored to your business needs using Laravel, Node.js, Vue.js, and Nuxt.js. Fast, secure, scalable, and automation-focused solutions that help your business stay ahead in the digital competition.

why.subtitle: Ready-made websites don’t always fit business needs. Custom web apps are built around your workflow, goals, and user experience—making them smarter, faster, more secure, and high ROI-driven.

benefits.title: Built for Your Business
benefits.desc: Every feature is designed around your actual business workflow—nothing unnecessary.

benefits.title: Scalable & Performance Optimized
benefits.desc: Your app stays fast and stable even as users grow.

benefits.title: Enterprise-Level Security
benefits.desc: Built with Laravel, Node.js, and modern security standards.

benefits.title: Automation Ready
benefits.desc: Save time and cost using n8n, Zapier, or custom workflows.

benefits.title: Better User Experience
benefits.desc: Fast, intuitive apps improve customer satisfaction and sales.

benefits.title: Fully Customizable
benefits.desc: Design, features, dashboards, and reports—everything your way.

problems.title: Common Business Problems
items: Your website lacks features according to your business needs.
Slow loading causes customers to lose interest.
Processes are manual due to lack of automation.
Weak security puts your data at risk.
Not scalable — the system crashes as your business grows.

solutions.title: Our Custom Solutions
items: Fully customized web app tailored to your business model.
Extremely fast, lightweight, and optimized for performance.
Automated systems — saves time and reduces errors.
Enterprise-grade security layers and protection.
Scalable architecture — system grows as your business grows.

custom_app_why_choose_section.subheading: We don’t just build web apps — we create solutions to scale, automate, and accelerate your business growth.

items.title: Enterprise-Level Security
items.description: We build apps with data encryption, secure servers, and role management to ensure top-notch security.

items.title: 100% Custom Solutions
items.description: Custom features, dashboards, automation, and API integrations tailored to your business needs.

items.title: Super-Fast Performance
items.description: Optimized code, caching, and lightweight architecture for fast and smooth performance.

items.title: Long-Term Support & Maintenance
items.description: Regular updates, bug fixes, monitoring, and technical support even after launch.

items.title: On-Time Project Delivery
items.description: We follow agile methodology, sprints, and strict timelines to ensure every project is delivered on time.

items.title: ROI-Focused Development
items.description: We focus on scaling, automation, and cost-saving solutions to maximize your ROI.

faq_section.description: We have listed answers to some common questions here. Please read this list before messaging us. This will save your time and you will get immediate answers.

items.label: What is custom app development?
items.content: Custom app development is creating a fully custom web or mobile app tailored to your business requirements.

items.label: What types of apps can be built with Laravel?
items.content: With Laravel, you can build e-commerce, management systems, CRM, ERP, booking systems, SaaS apps, and any type of web application.

items.label: Why use Node.js?
items.content: Node.js is used for real-time apps, chat systems, API development, scalable backend, and high-performance applications.

items.label: What can Vue.js do?
items.content: Vue.js is used to build fast-loading SPAs, dashboards, admin panels, interactive UI, and modern front-end experiences.

items.label: How long does app development take?
items.content: Basic apps take 7–15 days, mid-level apps 15–30 days, and large projects 30–60 days to complete.

items.label: Do you provide support after app delivery?
items.content: Yes, free support is provided for a limited time after project delivery. Additional support is available via maintenance plans.

items.label: What is the cost of development?
items.content: Costs depend on app features. Small apps cost 15–30k, mid-level apps 30–70k, and custom systems may exceed 70k.

items.label: How can I place an order?
items.content: You can place an order by contacting us directly via our website, Facebook page, or WhatsApp.

hero.heading_last: with custom content to grow your brand
hero.description: We design posts, stories, graphics, and campaigns for Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter, and more. Strengthen your brand identity, boost customer engagement, and take your social presence to a professional level.

why.subheading: Ready-made templates can't always meet your marketing needs. Our custom SMM services are tailored to your business goals, brand, and customer engagement—fast, effective, and ROI-focused.

prob_solve_smm.subheading: We manage your social media profiles and campaigns — making your brand stronger and more customer-focused.

problems.title: Common Problems
items: Irregular posting on social media platforms.
Low follower growth and engagement.
Inconsistent brand visuals and identity.
Lead or conversion tracking is not accurate.
Limited resources and time make campaign management difficult.

solutions.title: Our Custom Solutions
items: Regular and planned social media content.
Strategies to increase engagement and followers.
Maintain brand consistency with strong visual identity.
Lead tracking and reporting for better insights.
Automation and scheduled posting to save time and cost.

smm_defination.what_is_description: Social Media Management (SMM) is a process that increases your brand’s online presence and customer engagement. We provide planned content, posting, engagement, and reporting.
smm_defination.why_needed_highlight: it is important for your business?
smm_defination.why_needed_description: Without effective social media presence, brands may lose visibility and sales. SMM aligns with your business goals, audience, and marketing strategy.

portfolio.subheading: Our landing pages are not just beautiful—they are psychologically optimized to convert.

faq_section.description: We have listed common questions about Social Media Management (SMM) here. Please read this list before messaging us. This will save your time and help you get answers quickly.

items.label: What is Social Media Management?
items.content: Social Media Management (SMM) is a process to enhance your brand's online presence and improve customer engagement.

items.label: Why is SMM important?
items.content: Without a social media presence, brands may lose visibility and sales. SMM aligns with your business goals, audience, and marketing strategy.

items.label: What services does SMM provide?
items.content: Content creation, posting, engagement, analytics, and reporting—all are included in SMM services.

items.label: How often are posts made?
items.content: Posts are made weekly or daily depending on your brand’s needs and strategy.

items.label: How is follower growth achieved?
items.content: Organic and paid follower growth is achieved through strategic content, engagement, and advertisements.

items.label: Will I get reporting and analytics?
items.content: Yes, we provide regular reports and analytics to track your business success.

items.label: How much does SMM cost?
items.content: Cost depends on the package and services. Small businesses have basic packages, and larger brands have custom packages.

items.label: How can I order SMM services?
items.content: You can directly contact us via website, Facebook page, or WhatsApp to order SMM services.
